entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:20 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
